name: Kenophobia
description: A Psychological Horror Backrooms Found Footage Game

name: Scram!
description: Scram! is a platformer based on speed. Play as Boki, a mischievous goblin with a need for speed. Slash, dash, and dive your way through enemies as you loot the Petrifying Forest, Castle Ruins, and various other biomes. Fight off massive bosses in fast paced gameplay.

name: Hexguardian
description: A Roguelite tower defense game where you can shape the terrain yourself. Build roads and rivers, construct defense towers and economic buildings, recruit units, learn spells, and defeat various enemies from land, water and air. Hundreds of unique talents and combinations await you to dig out!

name: Undead Inc.
description: Undead Inc. is a high-risk, high-reward resource management simulator where you establish and manage a local subsidiary of the Endswell Medical Corporation. Build, manage staff, conduct research, and trade in both cutting edge medical treatments and bleeding edge bioweapons.

name: Madison VR
description: Madison VR now plunges you even deeper into its immersive and terrifying world. With the utilization of an instant camera in your virtual hands, bridge the gap between our world and the unknown. Snap photos, develop them by yourself to solve puzzles, explore the shadows and above all, survive.

name: Disminal
description: Wandering into the uncanny concept of liminality, captured in DV tape format you explore what seems to be another dimension, lost in an endless space that looks human-made but isn't.

name: A Snowman's Chance
description: Survive Hell as a snowman until you can freeze it over! in this casual action roguelike, you can "snowball" your way through the demons of Hell by collecting power ups and avoiding lava. but you might just have a snowman's chance...

name: Cards and Guns
description: Cards and Guns is a top-down arena shooter roguelite, where you’ll have to defeat hordes of creatures. Choose from a variety of cards and upgrades to create unique builds and survive to the end.

name: Betrayed Alliance: Book 1
description: A Sierra-style EGA parser adventure game. The first Book in a planned Trilogy of fantasy adventure games.

name: Surmount: A Mountain Climbing Adventure
description: Surmount is a free-flowing, physics-based platforming adventure where you’ll experience the joys of mountain climbing. Make your perilous ascent through the various handcrafted and procedurally generated challenges of Mount Om, all the while following a silly story with eccentric folks along the way. Master your own unique style of climbing either alone or with a friend, upgrade and customize your climber to stand a better chance, and maybe just maybe, you'll be the first ever to reach the top!

name: Abiotic Factor
description: Caught between a ruthless crusade, paranormal containment failure, and chaos from a dozen worlds, the planet's greatest minds must band together to craft, survive and – maybe – escape their doomed facility.

name: Banana Hell: Mountain of Madness
description: Jump your way to get the blue diamond as you try to survive a very annoying banana monologue! A REALLY HARD game!

name: Great Houses of Calderia
description: Great Houses of Calderia is a Feudal Grand Strategy game focusing on family dynamics & stories. Use your family strengths to compete against rivals to rise in the ranks of Calderia - produce, trade, scheme, bribe, and battle to build your legacy of power!

name: Indika
description: Play a third-person, story-driven game set in alternative Russia of the late XIX century where religious visions clash with harsh reality. INDIKA tells the story of a young nun who sets off on a journey of self-discovery with the most unusual companion by her side, the devil himself.

name: Foundry
description: Foundry is a first-person base building game set in an endless procedurally generated voxel world. It places heavy focus on automation, conveyor belts & logistics management. The main goal is to automate the production of complex items to conduct research and unlock more effective and advanced technology. The game supports single- & cooperative multiplayer.

name: Clash: Mutants Vs Pirates
description:
Clash: Mutants VS Pirates is a MOBA Game. The game story is about Space pirates attacking earth, but the earth is not the same anymore, it's populated with mutants because humans have mutated to different creatures after a failed experiment which led to massive contamination.

For now, we have 3 players in each race, and we are working on other characters.
The gameplay is so exciting mixing between many previews MOBA Games :

Melee attacks
Shooting, explosions
Special Abilities
Summon Creatures
Dodge-Aim-Control
Inventory, experience, levels

You can control NPC in the map and use them to fight other players; you can summon others (healer or defender ) from the summon area,
and you can buy equipment from your base.
You can use machine guns, and each player has his special abilities and power ups ,

A Fantasy-Medieval style map mixes between the future and the past, dynamic content and very cool graphics.

The most special thing about our game, the "Kinvaders" mode :

It's a tactic, domination, and pvp fighting mode, each team, has a King Invader "Kinvader", the team will try to dominate specific points on the map and protect their Kinvader , the Kinvader will move to that controlled point and sit there , the two teams will try to push the enemy's Kinvader to his base and control all the points to make their Kinvader move forward in the enemy's territory , once the enemy's Kinvader is in his base then you can destroy him and win the match ..

You can play a quick game using the matchmaking, or make a customer room and invite your friends.

name: Star Shredders
description: Star Shredders is homage to the 90’s PS1 era with classic schump gameplay and a story that keeps you blasting on!

name: Armed and Gelatinous: Couch Edition
description: Armed and Gelatinous: Couch Edition pits you against your friends in a fast-paced game of blob warfare for up to 4 players in the far reaches of space. Absorb a variety of weapons, trading size for firepower while dodging waves of bullets and deadly dash attacks from all angles!

name: Sudoku Party
description: Sudoku with daily competions, palying with friends and story campaign

name: Crossclimb
description:
Unlock a trivia ladder.

Guess the answer to each clue. Reorder the rows to form a word ladder, where each word differs by one letter. Finish the top and bottom rows after they are unlocked to complete the puzzle.

name: Pinpoint
description:
Guess the category.

There are 5 clues hidden on the board. All 5 clues belong to a common category. Your objective is to guess the category in as few clue reveals as possible. Each incorrect guess you make will reveal the next clue.

name: Queens
description:
Crown each region.

The goal is to have exactly one crown in each row, column, and color region - with no crown touching each other. There is only one right answer, and no guessing is needed.

name: EXVS2
description: The Final Mod Compile for the classic game Ultimate Knight Windom XP.

name: Polylylyrhythm
description: Rhythm game to push polyrhythms. Can you play multiple rhythms like 2 beats, 3 beats and 5 beats?

name: Minced
description:
Explore the Minced Meat Processing Co. facility, a place drenched in darkness, secrecy, and dread. Your mission: uncover the chilling secrets hidden within. But beware, meaty entities are prowling the shadows, and you must avoid them at all costs.

Solve puzzles, gather clues, and piece together the factory's nightmarish history to find out what really went wrong...

name: Astra Protocol 2: Audio Pack
description: Explore the stars with this free collection of six audio tracks, specially created for Astra Protocol 2

name: Classified: France '44 - Agent
description: Continue the war behind enemy lines with the Agent pack, outfitting your resistance fighters with new gear for your covert operations.

name: Journey to the West: Dark Invasion
description: In the DLC "Dark Invasion", over 30 new NPCs have arrived in the game, each bringing new mechanics and new stories.

name: Battle Babes: Lightning
description: Battle Babes is a fast-paced strategy trading card game. Collect, strategize, and battle your way to victory with 7 powerful hero decks! Experiment with 250+ unique cards each with their own special abilities. Customize your decks and defeat the Dragon Clan!

name: Idle Champions: Mythic Diana Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Diana (if you don't already have them) Mythic Diana Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Diana 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Diana Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Painted Tortle Gromma Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Gromma (if you don't already have them) Painted Tortle Gromma Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Gromma 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Gromma Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Fortnite: May 2024 Fortnite Crew Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Meet Me at The Workers' Club
description:
An interactive reconstruction of Alexander Rodchenko's Workers' Club, originally exhibited at the 1925 World Expo in Paris.

The virtual copy of the constructivist installation is accompanied by posters, photographs, and breezy texts tracing the historical context of workers' clubs in the Soviet Union, as well as personal musings about the role of the artist in a time of revolution.

The game functions as a walking simulator or interactive art exhibit, and players can look at individual works to find out more.

name: Growth Spurt: A Meandering Intermission into the Afterhours of a Miscalculation
description: A faux pas at the Middle School dance reverts Nour back to their primordial state and sends them on a one-night maximalist transformative journey. Flop, slide, leap, and rocket around the city filled with zany future friends and mysterious architectures. Play eclectic mini-games where you will discover whether surgery can be joyful, if aliens have feelings, and how to deal with a bad boss.

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Deluxe Bundle
description: This pack contains all you need for the ultimate Rescue experience. The full arsenal of Trailmakers combined with all the live-saving blocks of the Rescue Pack - tried and tested against the ruthless, intense waves of the High Seas DLC. The latter of which can now be applied to all maps in Trailmakers.

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Bundle
description: Get Trailmakers alongside our latest expansion: The Rescue Pack! Jump right into the game with full access to 9x new Rescue-themed blocks, 4x new outfits and 16x new decals.

name: The Talos Principle Collection
description: This bundle includes The Talos Principle: Deluxe Edition and The Talos Principle 2.

name: Free Lives Collection
description: This bundle includes three amazing games from developer Free Lives: Broforce, Cricket Through the Ages, and Terra Nil.

name: 1-2-Word Search!
description: Sin descripción

name: Screen
description: Sin descripción

name: FoxCode
description: FoxCode is a casual, accessible shooter perfect for unwinding. With intuitive gameplay, it welcomes all skill levels to dynamic battles. Stands out for diverse maps, from urban to natural, ideal for light, thrilling entertainment.

name: ConversationalRumblings
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction made for Dialogue Jam.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Thrills & Frills
description: The 10th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings Daisy Duck to the Valley, the new building Boutique to expand the Magic of Touch feature, the A Day At Disney Star Path, new features on Valley Visits and new items (and a new interface) on the Premium Shop.

name: DejaVu by dropout.tv
description: A brief maze game created by Dropout for an episode of Game Changer.

name: Hairy Trees Massacre
description:
When Lucy was 10 years old, she and her dad were attacked by a giant hairy humanoid while on a camping trip. Lucy managed to escape but her father was taken by the creature and he was never seen again.
20 years later, Lucy returns to the forest where her father was taken, in order to face her fears and get closure. Instead, she'll get a....

name: Oneiro Man
description: Oneiro Man is a 30-minute game aiming to be fun and humorous. In it, you'll have to write reports and play various mini-games. The game features 3 different endings, depending on your performance at work.

name: Die Rowdy
description: Die Rowdy is a 44 map megawad created as the thirty-third edition of the Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series in December of 2023. Loosely Christmas themed and highly Die Hard themed, each map was made with a skyscraper prefab and an elevator, courtesy of ViolentBeetle's Hellavator, of which players will be required to find a red keycard in order to advance to the next floor.

name: MapleStory Mayple Island
description: Happy 19th anniversary, MapleStory! Explore the numerous events, mini-games, and shops filled with one-of-a-kind goodies at Mayple Island. Experience the adorable new class, Forest Child Lynn, and her versatile kit that will be influential in any party environment. Play through the newly revamped [Hieizan] Theme Dungeon with quality of life and balance improvements. Organize your outfits and decorate all your characters with the return of the Cash Shop Transfer event. Create a Zero character at any time of the year now that Zero creation is no longer limited to specific seasons!

name: Super Happi Quest 3
description: "Super Happi Quest 3" is an RPGMaker game featuring the popular Happi Cat meme. Embark on a whimsical adventure filled with colorful characters, quests, and humor. Explore a vibrant world with nostalgic pixel art. It's a lighthearted RPG experience with a touch of internet culture.

name: Universe Wars
description: Universe Wars is a multiplayer game similar to Plants vs. Zombies. Plants become evil Earthlings, and zombies become cuddly three-eyed aliens. And on the basis of "Plants vs. Zombies" and increased the multiplayer online, fashion system, formation evolution, protagonist system.

name: Fantasy Quest: Errandsaga
description: Bin, has been brainwashed by the demon 'Basilisk'.Visit the mercenary agency 'Ninas Errand' on the continent of Mirgard.

name: DunJaunt
description: A focused dungeon running romp through the fantasy world of Relaryia! The land is sliding into chaos, and it's up to you with the help of a party of 4 elemental avatars to bring balance back to the world. Pick your favorites from Fire, Water, Storm, Earth, Light, and Darkness and cleanse the world!

name: Million Star Ship
description: This is a single player defense game for interstellar strategy. We have established 36 birth points. Players can freely switch birth points to control the size of the enemy. Set the moon as a base. Our fleet can conquer the universe and find legendary warships. Our journey is the sea of stars.

name: The Reeve
description: You are an Administrator serving your probationary period in a medieval town. Make decisions to affect the town's reputation, order, might and supplies. Choose wisely to deal with bandits, famines, cultists and plagues. The most difficult choices will decide the fate of your town!

name: Wild West Blast
description: Welcome to Wild West Blast – Your Ultimate Adventure in the Wild West and Your New Favorite Aim Trainer!Step into the boots of a fearless bounty hunter in the heart of the untamed prairie.

name: Any Way Out
description: Explore a mysterious hotel's treacherous corridors to reach the bottom floor and escape. Use your wits to spot anomalies, avoiding traps to progress. Trust your intuition to overcome challenges and find freedom.

name: 22 Minutes
description: In 22 Minutes, players must conquer barriers and fight opponents to progress through the story under a time constraint of 22 minutes.

name: Slime Slayer
description: You play as an adventurer who descended into the dungeon in search of profit. But it's not that simple. The dungeon is full of dangerous slugs! Either you are them, or they are you! Dodge these deadly little monsters. But don't forget about the attack either – kill them all.

name: Cat Got Your Tongue
description: Cat Got Your Tongue is a horror point-and-click game where you have to escape from the Cat by exploring the darkest corners of the house.

name: Bubble Dogs
description: Reunite the dog families of each breed and try to conjure up hearts, kibbles, golden paws and bones to score maximum points !

name: GrannyHop
description: The game "GrannyHop" is an arcade game where grandma jumps on a graveyard, passes difficult levels, collects bonuses and defeats obstacles. Addictive gameplay and colorful graphics.

name: Politician Simulator
description: A short, 5 minute funny game about politicians

name: Mini Micro Racing
description: Race through varied environments and master your vehicle to achieve victory. Annihilate your opponents with fun weapons, like the firework or the wasp!

name: Maze Pursuit
description: A Roguelike survival science fiction game, easy to operate, quickly get started

name: Creature Match
description: Creature Hunt Is A point-and-click Matching Game. With 111 unique, hand-drawn creatures, three difficulty levels, and an endless mode, it offers endless fun for all ages. Players can level up by catching numerous creatures, enhancing their gaming experience.

name: Backrooms Invasion
description: BACKROOMS INVASION is an exciting horror game that will give you a unique experience. Prepare for a challenge that will test your teamwork, wits and endurance! Multiplayer for up to 8 people!

name: Mist
description: Short atmospheric first person horror game with elements of quest and shooter about being lost in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by weird mist.

name: Sluggerpunk
description: Sluggerpunk is a gripping 2D survivors roguelike adventure. As you navigate through a myriad of challenges, hone your skills and strategies to clash with formidable foes lurking in the underground. Build a versatile arsenal of abilities and gear to enhance your chances to survive, but will you?

name: Kwark: Online and Multiplayer
description: Kwark is a game about a character who needs to complete levels and then something impossible happens at the end! The game can be either 1-person or 3-person! But now a MULTIPLAYER has been added. Play with friends, and have fun!.

name: Cats in Heat: Sunshine Resort
description: Adult-Only Casual Adventure game with animations, minigames, a funny story, and 3 cute catgirls!

name: Sex Simulator 2: Cumshot Edition
description: A simulator that will lift your mood! And in fact, not only the mood. In this game control will take only one hands!

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs
• Lunar Animals PAC
• Namco Pals PAC

PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs is an online-only PAC-MAN eating competition! Eat your way through multiple interconnected mazes using Power Pellets and a variety of Power Items to chomp the GHOSTS and opponent PAC-MAN players! Be the last PAC standing at the end of each match in this 64-player Battle Royale to be the Chomp Champ!

name: Fujisan Nobori
description: Embark on an adventure to find out the reason for the appearance of monsters on Mt. Fuji. "Fujisan Nobori" is a game where you defeat boss monsters on each floor and ascend towards the summit. Be the first in your country to reach the summit.

name: Doodle Factory
description: Welcome to Doodle Factory - your ticket to the world of factory fun! Dive into building and designing with ever-changing boards. Get creative, boost your efficiency with cool upgrades, and make each factory uniquely yours!

name: Cat Purrtrol: Find All 100!
description: Cat Purrtrol: Find All 100! is a relaxing, short game where you find 100 cats hidden in a drawing. It is completely free to play and is a fun quick game to spend a few minutes on!

name: Failure to Launch
description: Failure to Launch is a short physics based platformer where you must reach space with a small space capsule.

name: Alchemy Frogs
description: Alchemy Frogs is a local co-op puzzle platformer game with a 3D, isometric camera, in which Frog & Toad traverse a poisoned swamp to look for a cure that will help them save their family from being turned to stone. Frog & Toad will mix their potions to unleash powerful magical effects.

name: Moss Piglets
description: This real-time strategy game requires you to direct your horde of moss piglets through dynamic terrains and great dangers.

name: Project of Cooling the Earth
description: Players must survive in the ruins of the human world and face various survival challenges and dangers. Players need to search for resources in abandoned cities and wilderness, including food, water sources, construction materials, etc., to maintain survival and build safe shelters.

name: Blood Poker
description: The Rules are Simple. Bet with your Blood. Enjoy the Show.

name: Stay Alive, My Son
description: Winner of the Producer's Guild Innovation Award and based on the novel by Yathay Pin, Stay Alive My Son is a virtual reality feature based on a true story of a Cambodian genocide survivor and father haunted by his past, to first-handedly experience an inspirational journey about family separation.

name: Memorel
description: Memorel is a cozy puzzle game that let's you relax while you test your memory through interaction with hand-drawn images from days of yore. Explore the minds of artists from the 18th to the 20th century while you train your memory. 200+ cards just wait for you to collect them.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - South Korea
description: Puzzles of South Korea!

name: Mushroots
description: New RTS for everyone!

name: BioDive
description: Led to a remote exoplanet by a distress signal, B3-4K discovers a laboratory under the surface of the planet. Push blocks, flip levers, and turn mirrors to solve puzzles and explore the mysteries of the laboratory.

name: Dog Brew
description: Dog Brew - a light indie adventure where the main character, burdened by debts, decides to settle them through the art of brewing beer.

name: Medieval Blacksmith
description: You are a blacksmith with no past in the cruel lands where feudalism reigns. In this dark land where morality is dictated by the cold steel, the weapons you forge will determine not only your fate but also the destiny of others.

name: Forgotten Secrets: Escape Room
description: A year ago, Professor Oliver Wood left to explore an ancient temple. Worried about not hearing from him, you decide to go yourself to find out his whereabouts. In this escape room, you will have to discover what happened to the professor while you investigate the secrets of this mysterious place.

name: SUS
description: SUS : Survivors Under Space is 80s arcade inspired rougelite space shooter. Defend yourself from endless enemies. Select your weapons carefully and grab items to manipulate time and space, blow up the asteroids, and shoot down the enemies. Leave no survivors.

name: Field of Vision
description: This is a puzzle game. The mischievous little flying dragon jumps in different clouds. Move left and right to keep the little flying dragon in the picture and above the clouds, otherwise the game will end. There are attackers and bonus balls above the clouds, try to avoid all attacking objects as much as possible, and pick up bonus balls to get higher scores. The gameplay is simple yet challenging, come and try how many points you can get!

name: Persona 3 Reload: Velvet Costume & BGM Set
description: Persona 3 Reload: Velvet Room Costume and BGM Set contains additional content that allows you to use exclusive Velvet Room themed costumes and listen to 5 BGM tracks.

name: I'm a Rocker!
description: You are playing a metalhead in a post-apocalyptic point&click adventure game. Your wish is to go to one last metal concert, because who knows what tomorrow will bring. But to do that you need to create the conditions in the form of some equipment and a car.

name: Ijuu: First Escape
description: A full-fledged escape game is here by HaraPeko Club! When the girl wakes up, she finds herself in a familiar apartment room. However, the door does not open. In order to get out, the girl starts to explore the room.... Make your choice and witness the end of the story with your own eyes.

name: Sad Satan
description: You have been kidnapped by a gang on the dark web and you need to stay alive , but you find a group of audio recordings and pictures related to horrific crimes amidst screams of suffering in the darkness.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time - Chapter 2: The Spark of Imagination
description: The second of 3 chapters of the "A Rift in Time" expansion pack for Disney Dreamlight Valley. Explore Ancient's Landing to uncover more of its secrets and befriend a very lucky villager.

name: With Shining Eyes
description: Uncover secrets, experience history, solve puzzles and understand one another. Immerse yourself and explore a surreal and colorful world in this short, first-person adventure.

name: Midnight Cemetery
description: A Dark Adventure with Total Freedom and Multiple Endings according to your Acts. Travel by car to a remote Village to investigate Rumors of a Cursed Cemetery that supposedly is Zombifying its dwellers. Explore and Investigate with Total Freedom. Your acts have irreversible consequences.

name: Floralgraphic Memory
description: After decided to skip school today, Rose whisked himself away to another world full of whimsies and magic.

name: Piverantum
description: Piverdex has taken over the country thanks to a virus you created. As a researcher accused of an epidemic, he explores the entire country of Piverantum and creates the vaccine to save the country.

name: My Demonic Romance
description:
My Demonic Romance is a Visual Novel with a twist...
Sure you're playing a typically geeky guy with classes to attend, a job that sucks and a love life that's DOA.

But the difference is that when the cute, exciting and adventurous girl shows up, she's an actual demon, with horns, a pointed tail and a sex-drive to match!

As that guy you have to navigate your daily life while trying to keep your new demonic companion safe in a world that's completely new to her and not to mention handling the fact that she's not at all shy when it comes to her physical desires too!

You take on the role of Adam, a guy studying hard to get the grades he needs to succeed in life, working a part-time job to pay the bills, and all the time longing for some meaningful female companionship - who gets more than he bargained for when Lily, a succubus summoned from hell itself turns up in his life.

name: Astro Pig
description: A 90-s inspired lo-fi adventure puzzle platformer about a piglet astronaut and his intelligent ship.

name: Fantasy Survivors
description: A rogue-lite where you fight thousands of creatures, unlocking characters and equipment, to challenge deeper levels. Team up with friends or go solo; all drops are instanced so you don't have to share. Satisfying gameplay combined with smart choices make one-more-run a no-brainer.

name: Idle Heros
description: 《IDLE HEROS》 is a special placement game, invite your friends to form a fixed team, come to participate in the battle, placement can easily obtain a variety of resources

name: Exodition
description: You won't survive this game. Let yourself pull into this atmospheric narrative focussed experience .. If you are ready.

name: My Island
description: MyIsland is a fresh and beautiful survival game,You will drift on the endless blue South Pacific and survive on the island, discover the New World in the magnificent open world, hunt and travel, build houses and farming, and create your own warm homeland, lost in the beautiful Eden.

name: Love Hex
description: A short and silly horror RPG featuring a yandere monster.

name: Apexaris Tower
description:
Climb your way up the dangerous Apexaris Technologies Tower for your only chance at a cure. Many have tried and failed, could you be the first?

Careful where you step you could possibly fall all the way back to the start! avoid the zappers in each section, they will zap you back to an unfortunate location.

Use your special high tech boots to traverse the tower with double jump/ Dash! combining those with upgrades like Hover, Triple Jump, and a Surprise!

Warning: Rage may follow

name: Park Beyond: Beyond the Depths - Theme World
description:
Bring a splash of fun to your dream park with the Beyond the Depths expansion. Create a sunken water world with new scenery objects and watch as visitors get soaked up while diving into new water attractions.
Beyond the Depths includes the following content:
• 250+ Scenery Objects
• 11 Building Prefabs
• 2 Flat Rides
• 2 Entertainers and Impossification
• 2 Coaster Modules
• 1 Track Type
• 3 Coaster Cars
• 2 Sandbox Maps

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Sissy Wildflower Outfit
description: Even when on the hunt, Grandpa always expects everyone to look their best for dinner time! This DLC will give you one brand new outfit for Sissy.

name: Train Sim World 4: LIRR Commuter - New York: Long Beach, Hempstead & Hicksville
description: Time to truly experience America's busiest commuter railroad in Train Sim World 4! Return to Long Island and delve deep into an enhanced New York - Hicksville, now including the Long Beach branch, new lighting and skies, overhauled signalling, an all-new bustling timetable, and the LIRR M9!

name: Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack
description:
Experience the rustic charm of the countryside in Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack! Bring rural beauty to your zoos and let your guests encounter seven beloved animals that have lived alongside humans for hundreds of years.

Welcome these social species, the stunning Highland cattle with its heavy rich coat and imposing horns, the Sussex chicken with its playful and curious nature, the Alpine goat, renowned for their agility and sure-footedness, and the alpaca, and its distinctive slender neck and elegant posture. This pack also introduces the American standard donkey, Hill Radnor sheep, and the Tamworth pig. Craft homely habitats that let your guests get up close with the animals and perhaps even interact with them if they are in the mood for affection!

name: FelisBelus
description: A funny game to represent our pet cats and keep a record and memory of them forever.

name: Screw Pin Jam Puzzle
description: An incredibly creative and strategic puzzle game.

name: Whack 'Em Smack 'Em Byrons
description: They're wacky! They're smacky! They're smart-alecky! They're Byrons, and they're popping up all over! Bop these troublesome little bears with a swing of your patented PEEK-0 hammer, but don't whack their butts... and definitely don't hit their cartoon bombs.

name: Trainz 2022: Milton Valley Railroad
description: The Milton Valley Railroad (MVR) is a fictional railroad based in North Carolina, its reach extending at the height of its power all the way north to Canada and south to Georgia. The MVR as represented in this route is currently in the 1960s transitional era, featuring both diesel and steam locos.

name: Trainz Plus: Milton Valley Railroad
description: The Milton Valley Railroad (MVR) is a fictional railroad based in North Carolina, its reach extending at the height of its power all the way north to Canada and south to Georgia. The MVR as represented in this route is currently in the 1960s transitional era, featuring both diesel and steam locos.

name: Late Night Shift
description:
At 1 am you wake up to the sound of your cell phone, it turns out it's your coworker, you work at a 24 hour super market, and you work the night shift.

in this game you have to complete the tasks you are supposed to do, there are also several jump scares here, so prepare your heart!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Silver Fishing Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Gold Fishing Bundle
description: Get the Gold Fishing Bundle and gain access to the base game, the Spain Reserve, the Norway Reserve, and the South Africa Reserve, as well as the stylish T-Shirt Pack!

name: Cuckold Sex: Episode 1
description: Meet Lily and James and join them on their quest to revitalize their marriage in a new and exciting cuckold series. Confronted with the monotony of their routine, James encourages his wife to go out with a friend and find herself a younger man.

name: Syzygy
description: A dialog-only interactive fiction game where you play the role of Diplomat Calliope, charged with maintaining good relations with the planet Syzygy.

name: The Knight Dance
description:
Gather 'round, young and old.
Listen as I regale you with the tale of two lovers: one as sure as the other is stubborn.
Dancing shoes, a few stolen hours each night, and an important decision to be made.
Does love truly conquer...or is love never enough?

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Ultimate Fishing Bundle
description: Get the Ultimate Fishing Bundle for the complete The Angler experience. Contains everything you need to set yourself up to become a master angler!

name: Ninja Stealth 5
description: Ninja Stealth 5 is the new game in the series with a new challenge for you. Be stealth, evade from lasers, cameras, motion detectors and security guards. Collect all computers to beat the game.

name: Goonya Monster: Battle Pass - Eternal Pass + Infinity Cookie
description: Battle Pass item for "Goonya Monster". There is no end date for this product. Purchasing this item can unlock the locked for All Episode reward item and will be able to earn that item by fulfilling the acquisition requirements.

name: Stupid Cars
description: BECOME A BACK SEAT DRIVER

name: TRIB3
description: TRIB3 is a cutting-edge, multiplayer combat game by Flux Point Studios, blending intense action with strategic gameplay. Set in a dystopian future, players engage in fierce battles, employing a variety of weapons and skills to dominate opponents and rise through the ranks.

name: Witch Wrath
description: You come back to your house, but you don't find your spellbook where it should have been. Someone has stole it! And looks like you got some company too. Time for plan B: Guns.

name: A Faerie's Tale
description: A Faerie's Tale is a light-hearted and playful fantasy story about accepting change and finding a new home.

name: Lineal Distancing
description: Lineal Distancing is a community project with the gimmick of for ﻿each 1024x1024 block from the origin, no more than 64 linedefs can be placed.

name: Pikmin 2 Regrown
description: A mod for Pikmin 2 with streamlined mechanics, remixed overworlds+caves and a new boss enemy. Project lead by Rakton

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 12
description:
Bring new thrills and tactics to your Voyages with Sea of Thieves Season 12's audacious assortment of weapons and tools, all available to deploy from April 30th, 2024!

Sea of Thieves Season 12 adds two new weapons in Double-Barrel Flintlock Pistol and Throwing Knives. The Double-Barrel Flintlock Pistol, as the name suggests, can fire two bullets in either rapid succession or both at the same time. It is said to be designed for more close-range combat. Throwing Knives, meanwhile, are very versatile as they have three ways to attack. You can either use them to do a melee stab, which can be charged or uncharged, as well as for a range-throwing attack.

Sea of Thieves Season 12 is confirmed to add several new tools to the game, so here is the list of everything that will be added:

- Scattershot: A new type of ammunition that fires four small cannonballs in a short range but widespread.
- Bone Caller: A new throwable that can spawn three skeletons that’ll aid you in battle.
- Wind Caller: A shell that can, as the name suggests, call wind. It can be used to speed your ships, blow the timber out of your foes, prevent fall damage, and so much more.

Besides these tools, there will be two neat QoL additions:
- Ziplines: New ziplines will be added across the map.
- Harpoon line travel: The rope that you create with your harpoon can now be walked, but beware, you’ll have to balance or you’ll fall off.

name: Card Master
description: Design your own unique card and play online with friends

name: Finsternis Kreuz
description: A high-speed barrage-absorbing 2D action movie in which a girl who wields a magic sword that devours everything confronts vampires with two swords. Turn your enemy's power into a sword and devour vampires.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ghostly Park Collector's Edition
description: What is the price of eternal life? Stop the atrocious ritual! Don't let evil prevail! The soul hunter will spare no one. Can you master the willpower to win?

name: Sales Employee Takeru-Kun
description: Hello World!! This game is based on the image of a Japanese arcade game from the 70's to early 80's where you could easily play by inserting 1 coin. The player will work hard at his sales job to save L.Planning, a company that has been reincarnated into another world.

name: Blue
description: "Blue" is a hardcore platformer game with pixel art style. Players need to complete collection objectives in different levels while avoiding various monsters and obstacles.

name: The College Fantasy Before the End of the Empire
description: A fictional history based text romance adventure game based on the early 20th century. You need to use your choices to determine you, the one you choose, and even the fate of this country in an era where human stars shine.

name: Ecto
description: Play as bunny-hopping wizards with flower guns in a never-ending wonderland. Hold a frog in your left hand and a stick gun in your right as you jump around at 25 miles per hour, picking flowers and shooting robots with your friends.

name: Lizards vs Slavs: Arena
description: The great Svyatoslav Igorevich was captured by the evil jackets, and now they force him to fight in the arena.

name: Dragon Ruins
description: A dungeon crawling microgame for tired people.

name: Zombie Battle
description: The doctors would like create new humans. Stronger, faster humans. But the humans will be zombies. The zombies killing the doctors! Your name is 'Joe'. You are Soldier. You travel the helicopter to Zombie Land, you must save the doctors and kill the zombies.

name: Pocket Pusher: The Warehouse
description: A level for Pocket Pusher based on my experiences working in a Warehouse

name: Truck
description: Survive endless hordes of zombies by driving over them and upgrading your truck with weapons. The only way out is to keep driving. Survive 30 minutes in each of the five maps, collect coins and unlock new trucks!

name: Urban Nightmare
description: Urban Nightmare is a Found Footage like First-Person Parkour game where you are trying to escape a carnivorous city that is trying to kill you.

name: 21 Mayble Drive
description: You find yourself in an abandoned house, consumed by darkness and mysteries. The old walls creak, and the air is filled with the smell of decay and fear.

name: Fucus
description: A game where you fight against parkours and drones on an endless road in space.

name: Assistant to the Lost Detective: Remaster
description: A novel-style mystery adventure game. Explore 2D top-down maps! Enjoy easy puzzles and comical text. Become the assistant to the lost detective Chiho-chan and help solve mysteries!

name: Heather The Smither
description: Heather The Smither is a blacksmith simulator where you have to make the weapons, shields, armor and tool of the different species of animale that come to your forge, with the goal of supporting your family and helping your father.

name: Brids Huddled Together
description: A puzzle game all about birds, featuring two gameplay modes. Come and bird-watch in the game!

name: Tasha Keies & Clavyce: Enigmes Et Trésors A Travers Les Âges
description: Tasha Keies & Clavyce : Enigmes Et Trésors A Travers Les Âges is an adventure, puzzle and treasure hunt game. To unlock a riddle from a real treasure, you have to search for objects in landscapes, and solve various puzzles of maths, history, words, small games, etc.

name: Vice Grill: Synthwave Survival
description: Dive into Vice Grill: Synthwave Survival! Fight mutant hordes, whip up meals, tweak turrets, and tackle dynamic gigs in an epic 80s-style arena. Fuel your journey with Karl Casey's electrifying synthwave beats. Get ready to conquer this retro-futuristic world where survival meets style!

name: Para Bellum
description: Necromancer's army is gathering! But he can't afford Necronomicon Prime so his army can only use free medieval equipment set... We believe that one battle sister can solve them well. Go Forth, Sister Para, Blast your enemy in this survivor-like shooter game!

name: Bloody Feet
description: The girl is sold to an island as a slave by a gang because of her beauty. She seized the opportunity to escape from the prison. She fought the enemy with her legs. With these beautiful feet she would strike down the enemies who had insulted her.

name: We Need Space
description: A romantic comedy visual novel with a sci-fi tilt. If you've ever wanted to blast someone into space, this may very well be for you.

name: Sime is Back
description: Sime's back, celebrated by locals but tired of exploitation. Join him & his feline friend on a whimsical Adriatic journey. Armed with his fish, Sime confronts enemies, smashes crates & reclaims what's his. Dive into this charming adventure of chaos, camaraderie, & fish-flinging fun!

name: Jorogumo's Cradle
description: Jorogumo’s Cradle is a short first person horror game. You are stuck in the woods with a monster that attacks you during the night. Explore the area, build tools to fend off incoming attacks, and most importantly, survive until the very end.

name: Bikini Hunter Attack on Bikini Army
description: This is a 3D action game where you become a bikini hunter and fight against the bikini army. ・Use shooting, fighting, guarding, and invincibility techniques depending on the situation You can enjoy a variety of battles.

name: Asteroid Jungle
description: An arcade style ship vs ship stealth battle. Find them before they find you. Destroy their ship before they destroy yours. Only skill will determine the victor.

name: Mysteries of the Manor
description: In an old mansion rife with secrets, a pretend Taoist unwittingly encounters real ghosts. Unknown to him are their whereabouts, the victim, or his own fate. He must unravel the conspiracy through time loops.

name: 4 Kingdoms Supremacy
description: You are the son of a fallen king and have been raised by barbarians since you were a baby. Your mission is to end tyranny and conquer supremacy of the 4 kingdoms.

name: Stronghold: Definitive Edition - Valley of the Wolf Campaign
description: 'Valley of the Wolf' extends the base Stronghold: Definitive Edition campaign with seven new missions and extra achievements. Under the tutelage of the wise Sergeant, complete your quest to rescue the fabled 'Jewel of the North' from the clutches of the villainous Wolf.

name: Homing Instinct
description: Please send a completely intoxicated person home safely.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Farm Production Pack
description: Enhance economics, production & sustainability with 20+ new items, including selling points, production equipment, storage options, power generators & more.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Thrones of Decay: Malakai
description: The ‘Malakai – Thrones of Decay’ pack introduces Malakai Makaisson, a new Legendary Lord for the Dwarfs, usable in both the Realm of Chaos and Immortal Empires campaigns.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Thrones of Decay: Tamurkhan
description: The ‘Tamurkhan – Thrones of Decay’ pack introduces Tamurkhan the Maggot Lord, a new Legendary Lord for Nurgle, usable in both the Realm of Chaos and Immortal Empires campaigns.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Thrones of Decay: Elspeth
description: The ‘Elspeth – Thrones of Decay’ pack introduces Elspeth Von Draken, a new Legendary Lord for the Empire, usable in both the Realm of Chaos and Immortal Empires campaigns.

name: Aliens and Asteroids
description: The legendary journalist sets out to investigate an incident that occurred in a laboratory for the study of extraterrestrial technologies. But this trip is not complete without unexpected guests...

name: The Citizen
description: The Citizen is a very short first person exploration game about learning to be a good citizen featuring an overly talkative person who doesn’t really like you.

name: Kidnapped
description: Kidnapping, The most vicious crime against children. If your family member was kidnapped, would you be able to rescue your child from the event, or even survive it from a demonic clown? Good luck, and make sure you survive. Kill to not die, that's the most important thing you have to do.

name: White Path
description: Addictive and difficult, combining precise jumping and mental endurance. Explore this universe with double jump, dash, dilemmes, choices, 3d and 2d. Each level is unique, for an unforgetable experience.

name: Kingdom Of Peace
description: Take on the role of an ordinary, hard-working and adventure-hungry Racław, who wants to be as good a man as his father. Help people in the medieval land of the Kingdom of Peace! Fight, Explore and Meet new faces in this amazing world.

name: Deck Remover
description: There are many different decks. And your goal is to draw all the cards in that deck. It's a game of 70% luck, 5% skill, and 25% doubt. A card will tell you what the 25% doubt is.

name: Destination Paradise
description: Embark on a global adventure to uncover hidden objects in charming locations, solving puzzles across 20 captivating chapters.

name: Egg Defense
description: 'Egg Defense' is a strategy game where players deploy units to defend against enemy eggs from portals. Units have unique skills. Every 5 stages, players upgrade character skills using selected cards. The game blends casual strategy with enjoyable action for a delightful gaming experience.

name: Firewall: Cyber Defense
description: A lore-based cyberspace tower-defense where you defend artificially intelligent Constructs from Corrupted bugs and viruses.

name: Sheep's Symphony
description: Shee's Symphony is a rhythm runner fangame. Choose from a selection of outfits, stages, and enemies, and aim for the best ranking in each song!

name: Creator of Another World
description: A roguelike RPG with a high degree of freedom. Explore the world full of adventures, interact with its inhabitants, marry, steal, do farming and fishing, blacksmithing and forging, mix potions, build towns without being tied to any goal!

name: Warehouse Inc.
description: Receive, scan, organize, deliver! Become the master of logistics in this fast-paced and thrilling warehouse simulation game. Step into the shoes of a newly hired warehouse employee, where your organizational skills are put to the ultimate test.

name: Stacking Fairy
description: Let's stack various blocks to compete in height! It's a fun game where you can enjoy the excitement together with everyone or take pleasure in honing your skills diligently on your own!

name: Warfare: Battleground
description: "Warfare: Battleground" is a classic arcade shooter where skill and reaction speed play a key role. Fight on exciting themed maps and use more than 20 weapons to win in various battle modes.

name: Pocket Pusher
description: Your coin-pushing and ball-dropping fix! Drop strategically, win rewards, and enjoy the classic arcade thrill from the comfort of your home. A premium coin pusher experience, minimized.

name: Confusion
description: Confusion - first person horror. The main character is an experienced detective named Derek. One day he has to go out on a call, although this was not his responsibility. This event will radically change his life...

name: Taimanin Yukikaze
description: A classic visual novel about a demon-slaying ninja. Yukikaze is an up-and-coming young Taimanin with a suite of deadly lightning powers, but when she embarks on a mission to rescue her missing mother, she just might have bitten off more than she can chew...

name: Piko Interactive Collection 4
description:
Piko Interactive Collection 4 contains 10 great games from the history of retro gaming, including Evercade's first game from a 64-bit platform with the 64-bit version of cult classic Glover!

The games included are Glover, Risky Woods, Street Racer, Zero Tolerance Underground, Target: Renegade, Sküljagger: Revolt of the Westicans, Bad Street Brawler, Mermaids of Atlantis: The Riddle of the Magic Bubble, Star X and The Fidgetts.

name: Sunsoft Collection 2
description:
Sunsoft is back on Evercade with another great collection! 7 games from the famous Japanese developer are here to enjoy on one physical cartridge.

A selection of 8, 16 and 32-bit games including Ufouria: The Saga, Blaster Master: Enemy Below, Aero the Acro-Bat 2, Zero the Kamikaze Squirrel, Daze Before Christmas, Galaxy Fight: Universal Warriors and the first localised release of Pri Pri Primitive Princess!

name: Garm Ruins
description: An exploration-type action game in which "Fluffy Girl Doge" is the main character. Get the skills of "Doge" and explore the unknown ancient ruins.

name: Deflect Boy
description: Deflect Boy is a top-down arena shooter, that instead of guns, you only have a shield. Deflect the bullets, acquire, and combine new skills to create unique deflection powers and survive until the nightmare ends.

name: Dye The Bunny 2
description: Dye The Bunny 2 is an Easter-themed psychological and survival horror game and a direct sequel to Dye The Bunny.

name: XiuzhenWorld
description: "XiuzhenWorld" is a 3D stand-alone role-playing game. All equipment and items can be purchased from monsters or in stores. All monsters can be captured and turned into their own spirit beasts. The game has no plot and no tasks. You need to constantly upgrade to get better equipment.

name: Ultimate Fatal Octopus
description: A Touhou Project fan-made STG, also a collab game with Vtuber Syrena. Some day a random suspicious pink UFO showed up in Gensokyo. This must be an incident! As a result, Reimu and Marisa went on a journey to solve the incident.

name: Chesslike
description: A new outlook on the classic strategy game, battle your way to winning.

name: Hisa and Yomi
description: "Hisa and Yomi" is a magical adventure RPG. The protagonist, Yomi, wakes up in the "Tower of Water Mirrors," where time flows eternally. Explore beautifully illustrated maps in a side-scrolling format to rescue your friend Hisa.

name: Necrophoresis
description: Necrophoresis is a co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Explore a haunted morgue to find its dark secrets. Use what you can find to make your way through the morgue and find your way out.

name: Gray Zone Warfare
description: Gray Zone Warfare is an intense tactical FPS emphasizing realism. Join a Private Military Company to explore a vast MMO open world featuring a PvEvP and PvE mode. Strategize and survive against human operators and AI enemies while uncovering the mystery of Lamang Island.

name: The Snow Reach
description: "The Snow Reach!" is a highly customizable CCG tactical strategy game. You can combine various unique abilities to create your own personalized followers. The game focuses on Roguelike elements and player versus player battles.

name: Stolen Memories
description: Welcome to the real world! Hot girls distract you from your studies, but despite this, you need to get into the most prestigious university of Russia! Love or money - what would you choose? Or maybe both?! "Stolen Memories" is a non-linear romance visual novel.

name: Firefighter Connor
description: Firefighter Connor is a linear narrative visual novel that tells a story in a modern world where humans and furries coexist. The player will play the role of Luo Geng, who is 22 year-old, eligible for marriage registration, and somehow ends up with a marriage with a furry firefighter named Connor.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Thrones of Decay
description: This DLC will add three Legendary Lords (1 for each race), a Legendary Hero and new units.

name: Argumentum Ad Culpam
description: Argumentum Ad Culpam is a gothic visual novel about the world of eternal agony. Capricious dance of principles and death. Take part in twisted battles of wits where morality is only an instrument to survive and decide what future that world will have.

name: Whitewater VR: Extreme Kayaking Adventure
description: Get ready to paddle through some of the world's wildest, and most challenging rapids in breathtaking VR. With stunning graphics, realistic physics, and heart-pumping action, you'll race against the clock as you navigate through wild waters filled with obstacles and surprises.

name: The Foretold: Westmark Legacy
description:
The Foretold: Westmark Legacy is Horror Deck Building game inspired by H. P. Lovecraft.

Fight to investigate another day in this gothic horror adventure card game. Equip items and relics. Buy cards and use them wisely to survive what lurks in the darkest corners of town. Take a short and mind-bending dive into the unknown with a cozy horror atmosphere.

name: Big Butt Bobby
description: Big Butt Bobby is a 2D platform game set in a grotesque fantasy world.

name: Jetpack George!
description: Jetpack George! is a fun and addictive endless runner where George the cat must try to eat all the cans of tuna without getting wasted by rockets!

name: Tales from Candleforth
description: Tales from Candleforth is a folk horror 2D point and click adventure with puzzles and escape room mechanics. Using dark and evocative aesthetic it creates a nostalgic atmosphere where beautiful music compositions meet with 2D traditional and digital art and frame by frame hand drawn animations.

name: Footgun: Underground
description: In Footgun: Underground Roguelike meets Soccer in a pixel-art arena where strategy collides with action. Navigate unique levels with balls boasting distinct attributes and upgradable powers, precision and anticipation are paramount.

name: Bodacious Agents
description: Enter "B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S.", the highly classified secret agent organization. In this 3-D Platformer, your co-agents have been abducted by forces unknown on missions top secret! Take the dubiously tax-funded gadgets granted to you by B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S. and use them to save the world and your friends!

name: Tendryll
description: Delve into grid-based card play in this roguelike deckbuilder. Assemble your party, carefully select your battles, and construct powerful item builds to cleanse the Tendryll of its befouled enemies.

name: The Curse of Grimsey Island
description: Four separate cases spanning hundreds of years. Are they linked by a curse or something else entirely? The Curse of Grimsey Island is a futuristic detective game where you collect evidence, find motives, and solve one of the greatest mysteries in modern times.

name: Let Bions be Bygones
description: Having lost everything, a retired, hardboiled detective John Cooper, must take his last case in finding a missing upper-class girl among the lowest parts of the dystopian city-planet, Terrahive. Choose your unique path in this atmospheric narrative future-noir thriller.

name: Westmark Legacy
description: This gothic horror adventure RPG returns with a twist! The usual exploration of dark terror, is accompanied by deck building card game mechanics for encounters surrounded by mystery and the occult. Collect clues and solve mysteries along the way that will challenge even the sharpest minds.

name: Meow Playground
description: Meow Playground is an online game that lets you play as a cute animal character. In the game, you have the opportunity to improve your character, communicate with other players, and participate in a variety of games and activities, such as fishing or playing tag and dodgeball. Additionally, you can customize and decorate your own house to your liking. With so many options and possibilities, Meow Playground offers endless fun for anyone who loves animals and online gaming!

name: Foxyland Collection
description: A bundled release of FoxyLand and FoxyLand 2.

name: Space Routine
description: Space Routine is a space family life simulator set up in a retro sci fi cartoon universe. The player takes control of the members of a family making them follow their daily routine and tasks like going to work, school, shopping, leisure and spending time at home. The goal of the game is to survive the longest as a loving family in space.

name: Aqatillion
description: A retro RPG that combines fantasy and sci-fi elements into a time-traveling adventure. Help Stenobar Floreston and his friends uncover a plot that threatens the world of Neria in two separate timelines.

name: Crash Bandicoot 4: N. Hanced
description: A mod for Crash 4 designed to make completion and general gameplay more fair and more fun. It aims to fix the flaws and weaker elements of the completion system and level designs to make the game into a better version of itself.

name: Everspace 2: Supporter Pack
description: The EVERSPACE 2 Supporter Pack opens up new cosmetic options for series megafans to customize ships.

name: Mordhau: Adventurer Pack
description: This DLC features 4 Armor and Weapons sets.

name: OMSI 2: Add-on Zürich Tram Linie 11
description: Having a tram as a vehicle in OMSI 2, now you have the opportunity to drive through the mere center of Zurich and enjoy the classical, intact and divine architecture of this unique worldwide famous city.

name: Formula V20: 1985
description:
Formula V20 '85 is a racing computer game for the 24k expanded Commodore Vic-20. It has been crafted in the style of the classic Commodore 64 games Pitstop II and Pole position.

Pick from seven different racing teams and four different circuits. Join a single race or compete in the world championship.

name: Angel Legion: Seeker of Hearts - Blue
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Sprout Valley: Cows
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Fever Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Balls Bombs
description: Sin descripción

name: Eyeless Jack
description: Your house was foreclosed, so you moved in with your brother, whom you hadn't seen for 10 years. Everything seems fine at first, but soon enough, you'll find yourself in a traumatic experience.

name: Vampire Survivors: Laborratory Update
description: Plunging players into the dark halls of a corrupted science lab, our free new Laborratory Update pushes Vampire Survivors to such wild new heights that we're calling it our first ‘AAAA’ update. Industry-defining innovations include fully rendered running animations, mind-blowing train physics, go-cart racing, and... doors that open??

name: Cazzarion: Forest Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Clothes Line
description: Clothes Line is a comical adventure game about chosen solitude. You will have to face the worst of your fears: a new neighbour.

name: Farmer's Life: Pimp my Cottage
description: Requested by the players, delivered by the devs. Pimp my Cottage is the first DLC to Farmer's Life where you get a full interior/exterior design, new concrete and block buildings, and adorable cats and dogs. Don't be a wimp just pimp it.

name: Poor Thief
description: We're guiding a thief to steal diamonds on the ground, earning points as we steal diamonds, but constantly being chased by the police.

name: Escape Room Collection C2: Psychological Horror
description: A collection of escape room games with a psychological horror theme. Intensely scary visually stimulated and cleverly psychologically intrigued as players are both timid and captivated, you'll be locked in a room full of horror atmospheres where you must find clues and solve puzzles to escape.

name: Killer Vegetable
description: Girl VS Vegetables「crisp and fresh」A horror game aiming to conquer vegetables

name: Explorer: Adventure Awaits
description: Explore new places and uncover mysteries along the way. Travel through forgotten castles and wild forests, but be ready to confront challenges at every step, from cunning traps to formidable foes. The adventure awaits - will you dare to embark?

name: Melon Man
description: Embark on a deliciously delightful challenge with Melon Man, a charming 2D platformer that will test your platformer skills and tickle your taste buds! Join Melon Man on his quest to collect all his melons in this vibrant and exciting adventure.

name: Bloodwood Dungeon
description: Detailed, gritty text-based fantasy RPG centered on dungeon crawling with traps, puzzles, fights and loot. Recreates the gameplay of the old gamebooks. Simple battle system and hassle-free inventory management.

name: Mission Rovee
description: Control Rovee and complete her mission. Using the terminal and clever pathing, ensure Rovee finishes her mission successfully. Be careful, or she'll run out of battery and her mission will come to an end.

name: World of Solaria
description: Embark on an epic journey in World of Solaria, the ultimate free-to-play 2D pixel MMORPG! Join forces with players worldwide to conquer foes, master skills, and unearth hidden artifacts. Craft your destiny, engage in PvP battles, and shape Solaria's destiny in a dynamic economy.

name: Hungry Mouse
description: We control a mouse and try to steal cheeses on the ground, earning points as we steal. However, as we earn points, a cat starts chasing us.

name: Cyborg Runner
description: Endless Runner game where player controls cyborg, whose mission is to collect skulls and avoid spikes, moving enemies and other traps

name: Digital Audio Wasteland
description: Digital Audio Wasteland is a comedic first person exploration game about discovering the music in the world and using that music to change it by throwing the biggest rave at the end of the world through the music you find along the way

name: De:Fanastasis
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Out.
description: Race your ship across a metallic landscape and absorb power fragments to replenish your constantly depleting energy supply. Accomplish different missions and unlock new ships and materials. Compete on the global scale for the highest scores. New missions are regularly added.

name: AquaFantasia
description: AquaFantasia is an engaging and soothing idle game. Begin your aquatic adventure by purchasing a variety of small fry, raise and sell them. You can customize fantasy oceans with rare fishes to create your own aquarium.

name: Beak Blades
description: A fast-paced, crazy and chaotic battler full of different weapons, maps, game modes, and hats! Fight with swords, battleaxes, and knives! Blast each other with shotguns, rocket launchers, and flame throwers! This is BEAK BLADES!

name: Syon
description: A 2D horror to find and repel anomalies. Light the lantern of the girl and the ability of the ghost to fight back.

name: Astral Disorder
description: As the lone maintenance worker on an unkempt space train station, navigate the chaos unleashed by a catastrophic crash and evade a relentless beast. Armed with scattered tools and state-of-the-art equipment, outsmart your pursuer and secure passage to safety aboard a distant escape pod.

name: Phantopia
description: Sin descripción

name: Warehouse Manager Simulator
description: In "Warehouse Manager Simulator", step into the shoes of a burgeoning entrepreneur with ambitions to conquer the logistics industry. Begin your journey by acquiring your first warehouse and a humble forklift, ready to embark on a path towards warehouse management mastery.

name: Fungal Fiefdom
description: 3D Tower defense, fungi vs robots. Strategically place defensive mushrooms and use powerful abilities to protect your colony and advance against the evil automatons.

name: Puzzle: Lines and Knots - Free Levels Pack
description: The DLC contains +50 free game levels.

name: Hammer Knight
description: In Hammer Knight, you'll face an army of machines powered by ancient technology, relying solely on your architectural skills and the engineering hammer in your hands to combat the onslaught of machines.

name: Looking for Cold Girls
description: In this world, materials are in short supply. You must gather enough supplies if you want to escape. There are a total of 24 different props distributed throughout the scene. Every time you find an item, you will earn some gold, and your Allies will regularly replenish you with some gold.

name: Secrets of the Silent School
description: Secrets of the Silent School is a horror game in which you control a drone and must investigate the disappearance of students in a japanese school.

name: Nephilim Uprising
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey in "Nephilim Uprising," an early access celestial third-person shooter. Navigate procedurally generated labyrinths, face intense combat scenarios, and conquer divine challenges to prove yourself in the celestial arena!

name: Tavern Girl
description: As night falls, the city's neon lights begin to flash, and the rhythm of bar music echoes on the streets. Can you find the TA in your heart? In this city where night falls, your romantic adventure is about to begin!

name: Bestiary Survivors
description: Embark on a journey in a world on the brink, where dragons threaten animal homeland. Master five elements, utilize dual attack modes, and unique clan abilities. Challenge dragon bosses, uncover hidden tales in this roguelite, hack-and-slash adventure. Can you withstand the dragon onslaught?

name: Kaidann
description: You are trapped in a strange staircase, and you must determine what is happening here and head for the exit, which is on the first floor.

name: Way Nd Choice
description: Way Nd Choice is a game that combines a resource management adventure with a text adventure. Explore the world and complete the given objectives by consuming health, sanity, and gold appropriately. It's important to choose your options based on your tendencies.

name: Wage Slave TD
description:
There is no hope in the days of overtime work, but the boss is always urging you? Come to "Wage Slave TD"!

Place various wage slaves with special skills to eliminate all kinds of weird bosses. You will also encounter a variety of random events, which lead to unique attack styles.

name: Aim Down Screen
description: Aim Down Screen is the Gun Smith for your Screen! Go beyond putting clear tape with a dot in the middle on your monitor and customize your reticles and HUD with Aim Down Screen!

name: Astroswarm
description: Fight for your life against the incoming swarm of zombified astronauts in ASTROSWARM! Use a variety of weapons, turrets, and power-ups to survive!

name: Guild of Rogues
description: Guild of Rogues is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with Autobattler elements. Strategically build your team of minions to create amazing synergies and defeat all enemies!

name: Extermination Overdrive
description: Extermination Overdrive is a multiplayer shooter set on space stations. It features the Resilience Mechanic: every time you're defeated, you come back stronger. More hitpoints. More firepower. Every defeat is a step towards your next victory.

name: Farm Manager World
description: Dive into the agricultural life with Farm Manager World! Manage your own farm across vibrant global locations, cultivate exotic crops, and build your agribusiness empire. Welcome to sustainable farming at its finest.

name: Spanky!
description: Spanky! is THE booty-physics party game that brings cheeky movement mechanics to chaos-filled party modes. Twerk online with up to 7 friends and slap some jiggly tush!

name: Echoes of the Plum Grove
description: A new life awaits you in Honeywood! Build a thriving farming community that will last generations in this cozy farm simulator. Farm, socialize, make friends, cook, craft, forage, and uncover the secrets of the island! And if someone doesn’t want to be friends? There are always other means.

name: Denizen
description: Make a living for yourself in a city full of opportunity while you meet a variety of locals, explore unique locations, and work your way to the top in this open-world life simulator.

name: Dreambound
description: Mysterious deaths. Friends, both old and new. Dreams that are reality, and reality that is a dream. Will Noah be able to move forward and solve the mystery⁠—or will he give in to the demons of his past? A story-rich BL mystery visual novel.

name: EarthRoyale
description: EarthRoyale is a Map simulation Observer game where the game each turn chooses one of many events to edit the world map

name: Zruce Adventures
description: A brand new 3D platformer set in a fantasy world where an evil entity wants to destroy all life in the planet and make a new mechanized one. Solve puzzles, collect stuff and visit different places in North Island as Zruce to defeat this evil being before it's too late.

name: Sherwood Extreme
description: A co-op Crossbow Shooter with Bullet-Time Parkour! Race through levels and survival mode, chaining combos of slow-mo sniping and destruction to climb the leaderboards.

name: FiendFinder.com
description:
At FiendFinder.com, we understand that conventional dating just doesn't cut it for everyone. That's why we've created a platform where the desperate and the damned can come together in unholy matrimony.

Whether you’re haunted by loneliness, thirsty for revenge, or yearn for forbidden knowledge, we’re here to match you with the perfect soulmate to fulfil your soul’s deepest desires – for a price.

name: Methods 2: Secrets And Death
description: Methods is a visual novel with simple crime investigation gameplay where you examine evidence and answer multiple-choice questions about the solution.

name: Garn47
description: Garn47 is surreal low-poly 3D Platformer with horror elements where you explore an odd world that has been left unfinished to find secrets and uncover the past of a friend, careful not to get too lost!

name: Anime Uni 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Qusha
description:
In "Exorcism", a game in the style of Vampire Survivors, you gain experience and currency to strengthen your magical abilities and attributes by slaying massive amounts of demons with your ever increasing magical powers.
It is a course example for an indie game creator class launched by Lao V and Mo Hua and therefore is not particularly long, but free to experience for everyone.

name: Maiden Voyage
description: For some, a maiden voyage may end in disaster...A 32 Map Limit Removing Megawad designed for pistol starting.

name: The Masculine Urge
description:
[British accent]

hi,
welcome,

The Masculine Urge is a trap game, meaning you have to find hidden traps

name: BobasQuest
description: Welcome to the exciting world of Bobas Quest, a fun pixel art platformer where you have to make nimble jumps and complete levels using teleportation.

name: Wandering Pet Garden
description: Wandering Pet Garden is a relaxing pet collecting game with elements of simulation, collecting and resource management.

name: Tomb of the Brave
description: A turn based strategy game. Rapid level upgrade, high equipment drop, happy combination. There are a total of 11 characters, each with unique skills, and they will learn new additional skills after transfer. The combat section has sufficient content and diverse gameplay.

name: Odd Eye
description: Two different worlds from different colored eyes.

name: Ship's Cat
description: As the chief anti-rodent specialist aboard a passenger ship you must rid the ship of mice. Explore the ship and eat the mice in this third person action walk-em-up.

name: Emin's Journey
description: Join Emin in a thrilling quest for lost happiness in this captivating pixel art adventure. A 2D platformer by a creative mind, it goes beyond conventions for an intense and memorable journey.

name: Gnomber
description: An action roguelike where you use unique bombs to blow your enemies away. Use knockback from your explosions to throw enemies into each other or walls, throw projectiles and deal damage in creative ways. Level up, combine different perks, get new bombs and become overpowered.

name: Wild Alone
description: Powered by Unreal Engine 4. As you find yourself stranded on an island overrun by vicious dinosaurs and mutants, you must fight to survive and make your escape. Explore the island's dangerous landscapes, capture and raise dinosaurs to aid your journey, and outsmart the deadly creatures.

name: Customized Girlfriend
description: A stroke of luck presents you with a chance to receive a prototype mechanical maiden for testing, propelling you into a romantic adventure. As crises loom, will you protect the idol of a girl group or the mechanical maiden? Who will become your guiding light?

name: Grounded Sim
description: In this comical adventure, you embody Giles Outlandish, who drunkenly stumbles into a portal, mistaking it for an exit from a bar. Now trapped in Kayloo's Games, you must conquer diverse levels of various game genres to escape. However, the key to success lies in entertaining the mischievous creatures and avoiding the wrath of the monsters. With simple humor and clever thinking, players must navigate this whimsical realm to find a way back home before they become trapped forever.

name: Sacabambaspis' Friendly Adventure
description: A short and friendly adventure as a Sacabambaspis!

name: River of Rage
description:
Two park rangers have been asked to monitor the end of the infamous grade five Tully river rapids, and to help anyone in trouble.

With a storm approaching and a dangerous criminal on the loose, surely no one would be crazy enough to risk coming through this part of the river. But some rafters love to push the limits...

name: Evil Vents
description: Evil Vents is a survival game where you are trapped inside a vent system with a creature that consumes flesh.

name: Ultimate Sonic Fighter Remaster
description: Ultimate Sonic Fighter Remaster is a reformulation of the old Ultimate Sonic Fighter fangame released at Sage in 2017. The game has improved both its hud and its structure. The new Ultimate Sonic Fighter has extra modes and even a Tag battle system that was introduced in its sequel.

name: Labor Power
description:
Grindstone, Inc. is an awful place to work at. But you can't organize a strike all on your own. You will need the help of your NPC coworkers — even if you have to physically pull them away from their screens.

Labor Power is a small Pikmin-inspired game dedicated to class solidarity and the betterment of working conditions. Labor Power took first place at Gamedev.js Jam 2024 (theme: Power)

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Original Edition
description: Plants vs. Zombies: Original Edition is a Chinese-exclusive version of Plants vs. Zombies based on Plants vs. Zombies FREE, repurposed from Plants vs. Zombies 2: Evolve. It is developed to be a mini program on platforms such as WeChat due to the lack of official downloadable version of Plants vs. Zombies in mainland China.

name: Desktop Farm: Expansion Pack
description: This DLC includes more animals, crops and fences for everyone who likes this game. By buying this DLC you will support my projects.

name: Free Chess: Soviet Set
description: 1950s Soviet Latvian Chess Set

name: Search and Rescue: Mount Rainier National Park USA
description: Welcome to Search and Rescue | Mount Rainer National Park Washington USA

name: Laundry Night
description: You take a late night trip to the laundromat to do your laundry. It's incredibly peaceful when no one else is around, and you don't have to wait for a washer to be available. But, out of nowhere, spooky things start to happen. Will you survive the night?

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Honomi
description: In the elegant serenity of the imperial palace, Honomi practices the Geisha arts. She is ready to do anything her master desires.

name: Recycle Master
description: Clean it up!

name: Infinite Chef
description: Infinite Chef is a cooking simulation game that can be played directly in a web browser. It features a unique dish name generator and hundreds of ingredients to cook and play with.

name: Cast N
description: Sin descripción

name: Beasties of Greenhollow

Explore a mysterious realm of fairies, elves, magic, and creatures while fighting to the center of this hidden realm at the request of a mysterious masked figure. What are Shellycoat’s true intentions?

name: The Krilling: Scare Feast!
description: In this funny bayou based game, complete recipes as a cursed shrimp ghost by luring in and scaring unassuming hotel guests. Collect your victims emotions, mess with physics, and unlock new possessables to please the mysterious Gator Ghost and possibly become human again!

name: Phantasos
description: Phantasos is an innovative logical sandbox building game that opens the door to a world with no limits on creativity.

name: The Pool Rooms
description: Singleplayer simulation/ maze game. Here you will navigate through the gigantic complex and try to avoid the monsters. Equipped with only a flashlight and a fist to fight with. You will have to run.

name: Hop Man
description: Are you sick of walking? Do better and just jump. Go on a Castle adventure in Hop Man with your pals! You must overcome the traps by yourself to see what lies behind them, but keep in mind that there are no shortcuts to the castle.

name: Kanjozoku 2: Drift Car Games
description: Push your limits and dominate the asphalt in cutthroat street races!

name: For One Year
description: A blend of travel, survival, and romantic encounters amid the wonders of nature. Explore the country (and its people~♥) while sustaining your journey through hunting, fishing, and exploring caves.

name: Chaos Frenzy
description: Eris the Chaos goddess has lost her powers source The chaos emeralds by an unknow being at the chaos dimension, now she's got a goal to archive Get back her powers and become the chaos goddess once again but it won't be easy for her, emeralds have taken the form of her most deep dears, dont give up!

name: Hidden Object Secrets: The Whitefield Murder - Collector's Edition
description: Step into the shoes of a detective tasked with solving the enigmatic murder of a man whose past is shrouded in mystery! Can you solve another complicated case?

description: With the Ancients aside , the Descendants of demons enter, one against another . Approach onto the battle between legionaries one at a time. DUILIUS a mini Side-Scroller RPG walks you through the Epic Lore of Possession for Legions.

description: Joseph and his two friends set out for their village to attend his sister's funeral. However, they strangely have an accident on the way. After the accident, Joseph's friends go missing. While trying to find his friends in an abandoned town, Joseph encounters strange events.

description: A fast-paced puzzle adventure where strategy and agility collide!

name: Darklight
