description: Enter the world of Zlime, an action Roguelike game where you'll embark on a thrilling adventure in a demonic realm. Experience an unique transformation system, devour your foes, enhance your powers, and battle your way to victory! Prepare for an exhilarating and challenging gameplay experience!

“I...don’t want to lose you…”
The provocative, sensual, obsessive, and sweet tastes ―
Which dragon do I want out of the four?
"You" can make all the choices, only in 'Kiss the Dragon'!

The Psychological Horror Bundle brings you three intense and reflective world-acclaimed story driven horrors bundled together at a reduced price!

Burnhouse Lane
Jump into a terrifying adventure from the masters of horror, that will take you to dark places and make you smile, cry and question life. Finish hopeless tasks to win your life back. Solve puzzles, make friends (and enemies), run, hide and fight your way through peril.

Buddy Simulator 1984
The technology is finally here! We utilised the next generation of AI science to simulate the experience of hanging out with your best buddy. He learns and adapts to your personality!

Afterdream
Get lost in a lucid dream, bending the lines between reality and fiction. Utilize the strange camera to navigate through the ghosts' mysterious residence.

name: Death Park Bundle
description: This bundle features 3 terrifying horror games - the iconic Death Park 1 & 2 and the horrifying Antarctica88. Are you ready to face your deepest fears?

The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Full game
• My Room Furniture Set: Army Base
• My Room Furniture Set: Hideout

SAND LAND is an action RPG where you become the main character as Beelzebub, a Fiend Prince. Lead your company of heroic misfits and explore the legendary world of SAND LAND created by Akira Toriyama.

Use your tact and imagination to develop tanks and other vehicles for your adventures utilizing a wide array of part combinations.

Braun Rodriguez, a mercenary for the Weyland-Yutani Corporation, tasked with investigating a distress call from the prison transport USS Boethiah crash-landed on LV-059, a planet suspected of Xenomorph activity.

name: Dracula vs. Monsters
description: Will you emerge as the ultimate hunter of the night, or succumb to the insatiable hunger of the undead?

name: Roaches: The Birthday Party
description: Game includes 7 funny roach birthday party pictures as puzzles. Each puzzle is available as 25, 49 or 100 pieces. There is no time limit, reference image is always available during assembling. Take your time, enjoy assembling and have a fun with roach party pictures!

name: Splash Dino
description: Drag objects (wooden boxes and triangles and other objects) to help the little dino throw the wooden ball into the water. And remember that dino can help you with tips, skips and dino points. 100 levels.

name: Balance
description: A puzzle challenge. Balance between eliminating squares and preventing the numbers from reaching 0. From our experience, every game is beatable, but It takes some attempts to build intuition, so don't give up easily. [/img]

name: Hakoniwa Shou-ekiden 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Staffer Reborn
description: Staffer Reborn is a game of supernatural abilities and logical deduction set in 1960s America. It tells the story of a man trapped in a cycle of death and resurrection caused by his supernatural ability and the investigator who was recruited to help.

name: I`m Isekai Hero
description: Welcome to the extraordinary and magical island of your dreams! If you have always wanted to reach the island where the secret desires of every man come true, then this is the very island where it is possible!

name: Phantasm
description: A 3D psychological horror game about applying critical and logical skills to earn $100 billion and one cherished wish. Are you ready to take the challenge?

name: Cats Balance
description: Balance the cats and don't let them fall into the water in this 2D physics puzzler.

name: Combat Cat
description: A fast-paced, side-scrolling, bullet hell with an inventory system where a player can upgrade their weapons and player stats to survive as long as possible.

name: Miko in Maguma
description: Operate Hololive's VTuber "Mikochi" and aim to escape from magma! But there are ''35p'' and ''Holomem'' trying to prevent you from going home! ? If you make a mistake, you might have to start from the beginning!? This is a vertical scrolling action game that is very difficult but somewhat addictive.

name: Don't Exist
description: In this experimental horror wander the endless procedurally generated mall and encounter the strange and unique entities that inhabit it. Death is your best guide in learning how to exist in this place.

name: My Boyfriend is a Martian
description: Meet Katy, your average small-town gal. After a grueling day at work, she's just trying to make it back home. Little does she know, the universe has some surprises in store for her during her long journey. Get ready for an adventure that's out of this world!

name: Super Dragon Punch Force 3
description: Super Dragon Punch Force 3 is an exciting new free-to-play, 2.5D fighting game from South African developer Talent Digital Art. Jump into fast-paced 1-v-1 fights and master a constantly expanding roster of epic characters, each with their own distinct style and abilities.

name: Sir Bucket
description: Sir Bucket is a choose-your-own-adventure game set in a fantasy world with over 30 different endings. Explore the world and have your story told by a wisecracking narrator.

name: Hexceed: Flavum Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Flavum Puzzle your way through 145 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Lazerz
description: The fast paced free to play arena shooter. Master the art of hydraulic power movement, fly like an angel through the arena and shoot with powerful ricocheting lazerz to obliterate your enemies with style!

name: Bud Masters: Peace Edition
description: Bud Masters is an easy to pick up weed lifestyle card game. Contains the 'One of Each' game mode using the whole 155+ card deck. Perfect for learning the rules, combos and cards and seeing if the gameplay is right for you! No additional accounts, no micro-transactions or in game purchases!

name: The Architects of the Universe: The Orphans
description: The Architects of the Universe: The Orphans, is the first release in The Architects of the Universe series. A linear adventure title, with gameplay inspired by classic turn based RPGs and a focus on plot.

name: Night City
description: "Night City" is a cooperative first-person horror game with survival elements, here you will play as one of the company's clones, and go down into the dungeons to search for resources. Death will be waiting at every step, so work as a team.

name: HustleGame
description: "Xuyu HustleGame V1" is a game that combines parkour and combat. By blending parkour and combat elements, a game experience full of excitement and challenges is created, allowing players to experience endless fun and adventure on their journey to protect the timeline.

name: Letters & Legends
description: Embark on an epic linguistic adventure in Letters & Legends, where words and wits are your greatest weapons! Sharpen your tongue and show your enemies who the true wordsmith is!

name: TopSpin 2K25: Deluxe Edition
description: Fill out your TopSpin 2K25 collection with the Deluxe Edition, including the Under the Lights Pack, New Wave Pack, and the Rookie Rise Pack!

name: Marcella Moon: Four Are Watching
description: Play as amateur sleuth Marcella Moon to solve the cold case of her father's murder.

name: Edgeless
description: Start with the edge pieces? No way! Try this challenging ,yet approachable, 63 piece jigsaw game that has no edge pieces! 50 jigsaws to complete or choose your own!

name: Sword Smash 2
description: 【Overview】"Sword Smash 2" is an exhilarating top-down 2D action game with added features from its predecessor, Sword Smash. Various stages feature a diverse range of monsters, and defeating the boss in each stage leads to game completion.

name: Madoromi Travel
description: If you fall asleep, the game ends immediately. Slumber Travel" is a death-memory type simulation. Enjoy a mysterious trip through various troubles in the city of sleep, which governs sleep.

name: Paradise
description: Paradise is a Boys Love visual novel and tells the story of a group of men who go on holiday on a deserted island. When things begin to go wrong, they realize to their horror that they are stranded. Turns out that’s only the start of their problems.

name: Touhou Lensed Night Sky, Kaseigai
description: "I want you to go to the moon."

name: Stellar Blade: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Edition includes:
• Stellar Blade full game for PS5.
• Stargazer Suit for EVE.
• Half-rim Glasses for EVE.
• Quadruple Rectangle Earrings for EVE.
• Stargazer Coat for Lily.
• Stargazer Wear for Adam.
• Stargazer Pack for the Drone.
• 2,000 SP EXP.
• 5,000 Gold in-game currency.

name: Toing's Pops 2
description: Toing's Pops 2 is a singleplayer adventure horror game. Save your friend from his isolation while unlocking the secrets to Chardonnay's plans. Become empowered, and prepare to end this all.

name: GlobeXplore
description: GlobeXplore Drone Simulator provides FPV drone flying on Google Earth. Enjoy lightweight operation, customizable sensitivity, and adjustable camera angles with 3D global views. Ideal for advanced pilots, the simulator continuously improves with user feedback.

name: Class of Heroes 1 & 2 Complete Edition
description: Swords, Magic, School! The beloved JRPG dungeon crawler returns!

name: TopSpin 2K25
description: The worlds of tennis and 2K have collided. TopSpin 2K25 is the next must-play sports game from 2K that fully immerses fans in the world of tennis. For more information on TopSpin 2K25, including release date, game features and more, stay tuned.

name: It's Grim Up North
description: Our hero Terry is enjoying life in God’s own county, Yorkshire, until he makes a shocking discovery. His quaint English village has been invaded by... ALIENS.

name: Forced Sacrifice: Lost Soul
description: Nothing can stop the inevitable. Everything will play out, just as it has been planned. Forced Sacrifice: Lost Souls is a bullet-hell game with a storyline reaching for metaphysical and theological topics. Gather the power, get rid of demons and retake The Soul from the traitors.

name: Tell Me Your Story
description: Uncover Grandma Rose’s extraordinary stories along with Amelia, all hidden in multiple cozy puzzles spread around the world. Dive into globetrotter adventures, discover granny’s treasures, and relax along the way.

name: Rusty's Retirement
description: Rusty's Retirement is an idle-farming simulator designed to sit at the bottom of your screen allowing you to work on other tasks while caring for your farm.

name: Class of Heroes 2G: Remastered Edition
description: Are you ready to take on dark winding dungeons crawling with magic and monsters? Prepare yourself for a remastered classic dungeon crawler, full of exploration, combat, and endless opportunities.

In this game, players not only get to experience the classic match-three gameplay, achieving goals by eliminating identical elements, but also delve deep into various plot sub-stories with the goddesses in each level.

name: Pools
description: Liminal space game with focus on eerie exploration and immersion instead of typical horror. Navigate through endless alike rooms. Explore, orient, get out.

name: Womanizer
description: The charming heartthrob made a bet with his best friend that within two weeks he would put five girls from the city's rhythmic gymnastics team, which had recently won national competitions, into bed. Will Victor win the bet on the lives of the girls?

name: John Christian 3.0
description: John Christian 3.0 is a Christian adventure game with spiritual battles. The game presents the story of young John who, dressed in the Armor of God, embarks on his new mission to fight against the forces of evil in a universe with many challenges to free the imprisoned people.

name: Cats Hidden in China
description: Find 100 cats hiding in China in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game

name: Zombies, Aliens and Guns
description: Earth’s last hope against an invasion is a band of military rebels Zombies! Aliens! Guns! Enough said.

name: Dualis
description: Dualis is a sci-fi horror thriller whose story takes you to an underground research complex. You will have to fight not only for your life, but also to understand if you really exist. What is consciousness and personality are the questions you will have to ask yourself.

name: Taking Root
description: Taking Root is a cosy game about caring for houseplants and watching them thrive. Care for your houseplants in real time in this realistic simulation game and create your own urban jungle.

name: Roman Conquest: Rise to Power
description: Roman Conquest: Rise to Power is a turn-based strategy game in which the player can feel like a great commander of the Roman Empire. Lead a legion and go with your army to recapture the occupied lands.

name: Sneaky Seekers
description: Sneak into the shadows and, using your pickaxe, try to find the treasure hidden around the map, but beware: you're not alone, and your friends will do anything to get in your way! So be the smartest, and strike first.

name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets
description: Survival Horror in first person where you must manage your ammunition well, explore varied scenarios and face nightmarish beings, while investigating the macabre experiments with children, the result of a mind unhinged by madness and family loss.

name: Sand Land
description: Sand Land is an action RPG where you become the main character as Beelzebub, a Fiend Prince. Lead your company of heroic misfits and explore the legendary world of Sand Land developed by the creator of Dragon Ball & Dr. Slump, Akira Toriyama.

name: The Twin Paradox
description: The Twin paradox is an RPG in which you need to get ready for the first time travel. Learn real physics concepts in an easy way while you explore and talk with different characters. Prepare the best for the mission or it may be a failure.

name: Unrelaxing Quacks
description: Don't just sit back and watch these adorable rubber ducks float peacefully in a pool - instead, brace yourself for the unpredictable and wild world of quack destruction!

name: Ocean Punk
description: A pixel ocean survival game. Ocean current disasters have submerged the land and devastated the planet. As survivors, you need to build survival bases and pick up things to help you handle all situations, like the changing climate and the invasion of enemies.

name: Don't Flee
description: Don't Flee - is a psychological horror-thriller, all the actions of which take place in an old abandoned school, wherethe player finds himself to save his brother. However, soon he realizes that everything he sees is not true...

name: Running Robot Man 4
description: Parasail over lava, shoot monsters with your laser, and explore procedurally generated dungeons with your friends. An action-adventure roguelike made in Unreal Engine.

name: Moonlight Pulse
description: Teamwork matters most in this seamless, fantastical metroidvania within a living, breathing world. Realize each character's true potential to take down an invading force of overwhelmingly powerful parasites.

name: Paranormal Observation
description: Start your career as a ghost hunter with the latest technology. Use your computer to find out what type of ghost you are dealing with. Are you prepared to face the challenges of ghost hunting?

name: Love Sucks: Night Two
description: This is Love Sucks:Night Two, the second part in your mission to get laid and not die doing it. When sexy monsters are out to kill you for their own mysterious goals, it's date or die! You've survived the first night, but can you survive your second?

name: Truck Driver: Heading North
description: Expand your Truck Driver experience with the 'Heading North' DLC! Drive around beautiful Nordic inspired landscapes as you continue your trucking career and complete numerous jobs for new characters.

name: Cyberpoly
description: Cyberpoly is an open-world, third person shooter, and RPG set in the Dark City — a dangerous city dominated by money, crimes, and illegal trades. You play as a mercenary who takes missions, works in secondary jobs, builds prestige, and unlock upgrades.

name: SCP: Event Classified
description: SCP: Event Classified is a unique horror shooter that allows players to take on a role of a soldier, prisoner, scientist and even monster. Fight other players or unite with them to survive in this mysterious facility.

name: Ocean Current Punk
description: "Ocean Current Punk" is a Marine survival sim that expands the living space by building complex and massive infrastructure systems and fortifications. On your quest to find the truth, you will meet different groups, encounter unexpected events, and strive to become the ruler of the sea.

name: Old Skool Racer
description: Old Skool Racer is a complete racing game world that recreates the sheer thrill of classic arcade racing games such as Outrun, Screamer, Star Wars Pod Racer and Wave Race 64. The game is designed to be updated regularly in close cooperation with racing game fans.

name: Manor Lords
description:
Manor Lords is a strategy game that allows you to experience the life of a medieval lord. Grow your starting village into a bustling city, manage resources and production chains, and expand your lands through conquest.

Inspired by the art and architecture of late 14th century Franconia, Manor Lords prioritizes historical accuracy wherever possible, using it to inform gameplay mechanics and visuals alike. Common medieval tropes are avoided in favor of historical accuracy, in order to make the world feel more authentic, colorful, and believable.

name: Project Mikhail
description: Set on an Earth where mankind is being steadily annihilated by the alien invaders known as the Beta, Project Mikhail lets you pilot a humanoid weapon called Tactical Surface Fighter in the war to save humanity!

name: Foreskin Fury
description: Fight to the death in Foreskin Fury, a multiplayer online game in which each player controls a unique penis on the path to genital domination.

name: Stellar Blade
description:
Eve and her comrades land on the surface to reclaim the extinct Earth and cross paths with a survivor named Adam. Eve is then led by Adam to the last surviving city, Xion, where she meets the elder of the town Orcal and is told many stories. In order to serve her mission to save Earth, Eve develops close relationships with the key members of Xion and contributes to rebuilding the city.

On a mission to save Earth from the NA:tive, Eve is also faced with helping out the citizens of Xion. Whether you will help the survivors or not, depends purely on your decision as the player.

The game originally was announced as "Project Eve" in 2019. It was set to release for PS4/Xbox One consoles and PC, but a September 2022 State of Play revealed the game would instead launch only on PS5 and PC.

name: Mom Hid My Game! Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel Vs Capcom 2 X-Men '97 Edition Deluxe Arcade
description: Marvel Vs Capcom 2 X-Men '97 Edition Deluxe Arcade is an arcade machine produced by Arcade1Up which bundles in the games Marvel vs Capcom, Marvel vs Capcom 2, Marvel Super Heroes vs Street Fighter, X-Men vs Street Fighter, Marvel Super Heroes, X-Men: Children of the Atom, X-Men: Mutant Apocalypse and Marvel Superheroes in War of the Gems.

name: Siberian Dawn: Heroes of the Union
description: Heroes of the Union adds 8 new Rank 7 Units to the Union Bloc, and also adds the Guard status to the tactics cards. The Heroes can be added in a couple of ways to the game from within the ARK, and all these new cards can be used in all modes except the Training Missions

name: Verticality
description:
Samus finds herself on a very strange planet and must get out.
Verticality is a full-hack with new mechanics, enemies, items, and more.
Contains subtly remixed vanilla music.

name: The Croaker: The Ice
description: An Ice-Themed Expansion Pack with tons of new levels!

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Venice
description: Make memories and birdies on a romantic mini golfing holiday through the beautiful canals, historic shops and sun-filled piazzas of this favorite Italian destination. Discover for yourself why Italians call this magical place Serenissima ("most serene").

name: For Honor: Ultimate Heroes Pack
description: Unlock additional heroes with the Ultimate Heroes Pack! This pack includes six additional heroes with unique playstyles.

name: For Honor: Gold Heroes Pack
description: Unlock additional heroes with the Gold Heroes Pack! This pack includes six additional heroes with unique playstyles.

name: For Honor: Ezio Auditore – Peacekeeper Hero Skin
description: Embody Ezio Auditore, the iconic Assassin from Renaissance Italy, in the world of For Honor.

name: Hell Let Loose: Oak Leaf
description: Emerge from the foliage with this autumn version of the iconic Oak Leaf camo pattern that was used by troops throughout WW2.

name: Ylands: Supporter Pack
description: Indulge in exclusive aesthetic and show off your support of the game with this pack full of unique cosmetic items. The cosmetic items included in this Supporter pack cannot be obtained in any other way.

description: Oriental Valley × Village Head Yiang Crossover Bundle DLC.Contains two main character costumes

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Mini Beasts
description: Pixel Puzzles, The Number #1 place for Jigsaws!

name: Age of Water: Gold Edition
description: Includes in-game currency (3000 Corks and 250 000 Medallions). Corks will come in handy when you need to buy in-game resources from vendors and repair your ship to advance faster through the game, where medallions can be used to purchase decorations. Replaces four default common boats with upgraded boats of the Barracuda team and three ordinary crew members with crewmen from the Barracuda team.

name: Age of Water: Silver Edition
description: Includes in-game currency (1000 Corks and 100 000 Medallions). Corks will come in handy when you need to buy in-game resources from vendors and repair your ship to advance faster through the game, where medallions can be used to purchase decorations. Replaces four default common boats with upgraded boats of the Barracuda team.

name: Sker Collectors Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud offer you the Sker Collectors edition including Sker Ritual and Maid of Sker all in one Sker-y bundle.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Additional Character Pack vol.1 "Dia & Hanamaru & Kanan"
description: Three characters have become playable characters and new! Let's adventure in the mirror world with Dia, Hanamaru and Kanan!

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!!!: Hit Song + VTuber Pack 6
description: Sin descripción

name: For a Vast Future: GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Steamy Maid
description: Meet over 30 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Toridama 2: Brave Challenge
description:
The battle to determine the ultimate chicken is back!
Various intense situations will test your Chicken Level!

name: Timberdoku
description: Place and clear blocks in this addictive and challenging puzzle game

name: World War: Battle of the Bulge
description: A reality FPS game set in WWII! This time a ground battle with tanks in a snowy winter! Get weapons and tanks to complete your mission on the battlefield!

name: Finding America: The Pacific Northwest - Collector's Edition
description: Explore the Pacific Northwest!

name: Tile Cross
description: Sin descripción

name: Astra
description: Welcome to Astra, your ticket to the stars. This Mixed Reality Experience transports you from Earth to the deepest corners of the cosmos as you embark on a quest to uncover the key ingredients of life in the Universe. Step foot on planets and their dark moons in a search for future worlds and far away beings.

name: Gemz
description: Immerse yourself in the fast-paced world of Gemz, where your shield stands as the last line of defense against advancing gemstones. Use precise control to block and smash gems, collecting powerups, coins, and facing off against mini-bosses along the way. As time ticks away, the gems intensify in speed, testing your reflexes and strategic thinking. Combine powerups for ultimate survival as you strive for the highest score and become the ultimate Gemz master!

name: Baroll
description: Sin descripción

name: OhShape Ultimate
description:
Enjoy this celebrated VR rhythm game that offers a unique way of moving your whole body with a renewed look and lots of extra content, for this new era!
In addition to the classic wall-punching, obstacle-dodging, and fun pose-making, get your full-body cardio workout with 6 new sessions and 2 difficulty levels, designed to make you sweat and engage every part of your body!

name: Heian City Story
description:
A city-building sim with a historical twist
Travel back to olden times and become Director of your own city!
Attract new residents and try to become the greatest city in the land! Add buildings like restaurants and teahouses to make your town a place where samurai and commoners alike will want to live.

name: Capcom Mystery Adventure Double Pack
description: A bundle containing both "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy" and "Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective".

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Invitation to the Mad Banquet
description:
Version 7.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 2: The Seven Shus in the Maze
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Mad Pleasure: Shadowbringer (Thelema)
• New Featured Event: Flying to Oxia Invitation Contest
• ...and more!

name: Mine Sweeper Million
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Game The Dr. Mouse's Lab
description:
Who's smarter? Dr.Mouse or you!?
Use items smartly and get out of the lab!!

name: Our Field Trip Adventure
description:
A school trip is all about learning and having fun!
Have a blast and make memories with your friends!

name: Purple Slime Production Line
description: Guide the slimes to their destiny, across 100 levels of gravity shifting puzzle action!

name: The Epyx Collection: Handheld
description: Witness the return of six awesome Epyx classics from the 1980s/90s, originally designed for cutting-edge handheld gaming.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - The Book of Hungry Names: Wardens and Furies
description: Wardens and Furies unlocks the options to play as a member of the Black Fury tribe or the Hart Warden tribe, as well as adding new Gifts for the tribes.

name: Icarus: Pet Companions Pack
description: This pack unlocks 10 new animals that you can have as tamed pets along with unique talent trees to have as companions as you survive on Icarus

name: Icarus: Zebra Rescue Mission
description: unlocks the Zebra Rescue Mission, tasking you with locating 5 wild Zebra across the surface for Sinotai and returning them safely. Your reward for completing this mission is the 5 rescued Zebras as new mounts for you to train, equip and ride.

name: What Happened to Kate
description: "What happened to Kate" is a gripping puzzle adventure set in a mysteriously silent home. Unravel your coworker's disappearance through challenging puzzles. Delve into the depths of mystery and discover what lies within the quiet.

name: Sandwich Sim
description: A game where you play as a slightly confused bear trying to assemble the ultimate meal no matter who tries to get in your way. Relax and fish, visit the grocery store, escape bureaucracy, and more on your way to achieve enlightenment via sandwich.

name: Human Upgrade Labs
description: You will be taking on various tests/puzzles in Human Upgrade Labs. These tests will essentially be various mini games, 30 of them, placed into several different categories, created using multiple hand painted and sometimes experimental visual styles and combined into a single story.

name: Rusty Dusty
description: "Rusty Dusty es un juego 2D donde un robot de limpieza lucha por su libertad en un edificio residencial, enfrentando temas de clasismo. Los jugadores toman decisiones importantes que afectan el destino del protagonista."

name: Floor 10
description: You have to take some weird elevator to the 10th floor. Stay alert to get to the 10th floor.

name: Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey
description: Embark on a first-person farming simulator in Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey. Cultivate your land, craft, gather resources, raise livestock, and defend your farm. Every sunrise brings new adventures. Are you ready to grow?

name: D.W. The Picky Eater
description: Explore and share Marc Brown’s classic, adapted from the original storybook into an interactive animated adventure! D.W. and her entire family bring the story alive one word at a time, offering an easy to digest reading mode which is fully animated and voiced.

name: DNA: Episode 4
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: AOD
description: Arrival of DeadIt is a third-person horror game about survival and death. There is a witty and beautiful girl who is always on the verge of life and death. Don't panic, don't be afraid.

name: Spellarium 6
description: Spellarium is becoming increasingly puzzle-like! In this game, we've introduced the Iron Box, which adds some twists to the levels. As usual, there's a story to follow, a town to build, and some bonus games!

name: Karsus
description: Guide Karsus the Magician through the caves to search for his magic book, challenge the pumpkin monsters, skeletons, bats, spiders.

name: Geometric Sniper Bundle
description: Put an end to evil... and evildoers!

name: Five Nights of Nightmare: Escape Horror Story
description: A chilling horror game that will push your nerves to the limit... An abandoned house, shrouded in a dark secret with the terrifying ghost of an old woman.

name: Cape's Escape Game 8th Room
description: Solve the mystery and escape from the room

name: Fallout 4: Next-Gen Update
description:
This free update includes native applications for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S, Performance mode and Quality mode settings, as well as stability improvements and fixes. Experience up to 60 FPS and increased resolutions! Fallout 4 players on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One will also receive a free update with stability improvements, login and quest fixes. Experience Fallout 4 on your next-generation PC with widescreen and ultra-widescreen support, as well as fixes to Creation Kit and a variety of quest updates. Players with PC versions of Fallout 4 on Steam, Microsoft Store and GOG will receive stability, mods and bug fixes. For Japanese and Chinese language players on PC, Bethesda.net login issues have been resolved, fixing access to mods. Alongside this exciting update, Fallout 4 will be available to purchase on the Epic Games Store. Fallout 4 also will be Steam Deck verified.

There's even more content in the Fallout 4 updates, including the following free Creation Club items!

- Enclave Remnants brings the Pre-War cabal, The Enclave, into the Fallout 4 storyline. In this new quest, “Echoes of the Past,” can you stop The Enclave from spreading their dangerous ideology and gaining a foothold in the Commonwealth? Along with workshop items and the Enclave Colonel uniform, we are including the following previously released Creation Club content including Enclave Weapon Skins, Enclave Armor Skins, Tesla Cannon, Hellfire Power Armor, X-02 Power Armor, and the Heavy Incinerator.

- Makeshift Weapon Pack: Ever thought a piggy bank would make a great weapon in a pinch? This weapon pack includes a variety of unconventional objects that have been transformed into deadly weapons, such as: a baseball launcher, a nail gun and a piggy bank.

- Halloween Workshop: Leftover from an ill-fated Halloween party, thrown by the New England Technocrat Society, these 38 new Halloween decorations include witches, cauldrons, ghouls and more! Decorate for Halloween or make your settlements spooky all year round!

name: Dynamite It!
description: "Dynamite It!" is a fast-paced and explosive game that challenges you to guide a dynamite stick to the end of the level before it explodes.

name: Dreams and Bubbles
description: It is a game that combines maze exploration and action shooting elements.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Mature, Level-Headed, and Dependable Secretary Maid GP-01
description: "Secretary Maid" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01."[Empire Life Mode]・In this mode, you can see a conversation between maids you created!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Mature, Level-Headed, and Dependable Secretary Maid GP-01fb
description: "Secretary Maid" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01fb." The following two events will be added. ・Sexy love date play ・Happy happy morning!
